The Elder Sanniá¹­á¹­hÄpaka
Having made a hut in the wilderness,
I lived in the mountains;
Content with gain and no gain,
with fame and no fame.
Padumuttara, the knower of the world,
the receiver of offerings,
With a hundred thousand powerful ones,
came into my presence.
